title: Gundam: G no Reconguista - From the Past to the Future
original_name: ガンダム G のレコンギスタ FROM THE PAST TO THE FUTURE
ending_song: "G no Senkou (G の閃光)" by Daisuke Hasegawa (ハセガワダイスケ)
sinopse: Bell and Aida are scouting the zone around Towasanga, when they're attacked by Mask Squad. Mask is piloting a new unit, a pitch black Phenex.
